name: Lilly's Potion Shop
description:
A third-person shooter in a bright, colorful world, where dynamic battles are mixed with leisurely exploration of the world in search for ingredients, and an intricate plot. Feel like a wizard, thanks to the unusual mechanics of making potions. You yourself decide which potion is the best for the client and your choice affects the further events.
Lilly's Grandma suddenly fell ill. Now Lilly has to replace her at work for a while.
But there is one small detail. Lilly's Grandma is an owner of an alchemy shop. But Lilly has never brewed potions, and doesn’t even know what she’s about to do. Help Lilly save the shop from bankruptcy and defeat spirits who are not happy about ingredient collectors at all. It is also important not to succumb to dubious orders from unscrupulous clients. And try not to blow up the shop along with the village.
  • Dynamic battles.
  • Unusual mechanics of making potions - feel like a wizard.
  • Explore the world in search of ingredients for potions. Focus on the shape of rivers, mountains, roads and other terrain features to find the right place. Or just take the amulet that will take you to the right place.
  • A bright, beautiful world.
  • Multiple endings.
  • * Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Spanish, translations are done using AI.
